languages.text: {n}Инфокрипта на месте, но сам разъем закрыт двумя рядами металлических когтей, растущих прямо из корпуса когитатора. Под вашим пристальным взглядом острия слегка сжимаются, еще крепче зажимая инфокрипту в ее гнезде.{/n}

{n}The data-crypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight out of the cogitator's casing. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Инфокрипта на месте, но сам разъем закрыт двумя рядами металлических когтей, растущих прямо из корпуса когитатора. Под вашим пристальным взглядом острия слегка сжимаются, еще крепче зажимая инфокрипту в ее гнезде.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cybercrypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight from the cogitator's case. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}
{n}The cybercrypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight from the cogitator's case. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}

{n}The data-crypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight out of the cogitator's casing. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉思者上确实连接着数据密存器，但它的插槽被两排金属爪子保护着。这些爪子直接从沉思者的外壳中伸出来。在你的凝视之下，它们蜷曲起来，将数据密存器抓得更紧了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data-crypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight out of the cogitator's casing. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}思考器上确实连接着数据密存器，但它的插槽被两排金属爪子保护着。这些爪子直接从思考器的外壳中伸出来。在你的凝视之下，它们蜷曲起来，将数据密存器抓得更紧了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La cripta de datos está en su sitio, pero la ranura está protegida por dos hileras de garras de metal que salen de la carcasa del cogitador. Al mirarlas, se contraen para sujetar con más fuerza el dispositivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data-crypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight out of the cogitator's casing. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La cripta de datos está en su sitio, pero la ranura está protegida por dos hileras de garras de metal que salen de la carcasa del cogitador. Al mirarlas, se contraen para sujetar con más fuerza el dispositivo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}データ・クリプトはあるべきところにあるが、スロットは考算機の本体からまっすぐに伸びた2列の金属の爪で守られている。じっと見ていると、爪が動き出して装置をさらにがっしりと掴んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data-crypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight out of the cogitator's casing. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}データ・クリプトはあるべきところにあるが、スロットは考算機の本体からまっすぐに伸びた2列の金属の爪で守られている。じっと見ていると、爪が動き出して装置をさらにがっしりと掴んだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Daten-Krypta ist an ihrem Ort, aber ihr Slot wird von zwei Reihen Metallklauen geschützt, die direkt aus dem Gehäuse des Cogitators wachsen. Auf deinen Zugriff hin umfassen sie das Gerät nur noch fester.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data-crypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight out of the cogitator's casing. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Daten-Krypta ist an ihrem Ort, aber ihr Slot wird von zwei Reihen Metallklauen geschützt, die direkt aus dem Gehäuse des Cogitators wachsen. Auf deinen Zugriff hin umfassen sie das Gerät nur noch fester.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La crypte de données est bien en place, mais la fente est protégée par deux rangées de griffes de métal qui sortent directement du boîtier du cogitateur. Alors que vous les observez de plus près, elles resserrent leur emprise sur l'appareil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data-crypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight out of the cogitator's casing. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Veri mahzeni yerinde ancak yuva, kavramsayarın kasasından başlayan iki sıra metal pençeyle korunuyor. Pençeler, bakışların altında esneyip iyice sıkılaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The data-crypt is in place, but its slot is protected by two rows of metal claws growing straight out of the cogitator's casing. They flex under your scrutiny, clutching the device even tighter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Veri Mahzeni yerinde ancak yuva, kavramsayarın kasasından başlayan iki sıra metal pençe tarafından korunuyor. Pençeler bakışların altında esneyip iyice sıkılaşıyor.{/n}
